item.title: About
item.description: About me I am Inno Jia. A junior in School of Software, Shandong University. I will graduate in 2020. My major is Artificial Intelligence, and my interests focus on machine learning and algorithm. Now my work is mainly at signal processing. I am a programming enthusiast and willing to share and discuss. I am a typical user of python, and my favorite static language is Golang. In many ways, I like to learn various programming languages and skills.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Welcome to Hugo world It’s the first post of the hugo site!
